intro: Zieria, commonly known as the fairy candles, is a genus of flowering plants native to Australia. They are part of the family Epacridaceae and are characterized by their evergreen foliage and compact growth habit. Zieria species are often found in heathlands and sclerophyllous forests, thriving in well-drained soils. Due to their ornamental value, some species are cultivated in gardens, though they require specific conditions to flourish.
